item.description:
There's a chance this will be our final happy hour of 2008. So, join us for one last happy time this year.
WOW! Can't believe it's been a year since I donned the tiara. What a year of great times with good friends.

Get there when you can. I will arrive at 5:30 and hang until about 8.
The first new member who finds me, gets a free drink. Don't be shy...Say hi
Come out to enjoy friendly conversation with new and familiar folks before you head home.

DJ Michael, whose company, is the granddaddy of Boston trivia begins testing for useless facts at 6:30.

If you decide to eat, here's the menu http://www.elephantca...
Elephant & Castle Pub and Restaurant Web Page

Pat, one of our trivia royalty, is leaving very soon for France, if he joins us, you can wish him bon voyage.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU

Check out http://mbta.com/... or http://www.hopstop.co... to create your route by public transit. State Street (orange & blue lines), Government (green & blue lines) and Downtown Crossing (orange & red lines) subway stations are no more than a ten (10) minute walk away.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the bar wearing a Happy New Year tiara
item.name: Our Last Happy Hour of 2008 - Maybe
